page.title: 15SAINT MARYS CHURCH
page.content: The village is centred around its church ,the Parish Church of Saint Mary.The earlier parts of the church are possibly{pre Norman}so part of the church we now see would have been seen by those conducting the first Doomesday Survey.The church is made of local sandstone this causes problems as in todays polluted atmosphere it is weathering quite badly and a great deal of restoration has been done.The church was the only church to serve the people of Worsbrough for many years and so as the population grew the church was added to in the 14th and 15th centuries.Inside the church is a unique monument to{Sir Roger {Rockley},Knight,whose family lived at Rockley Manor and were patrons of the church.In recent years the church yard has been used by local schools to perform{Mediaeval Mystery Plays}.
